phrases: Hey, at least we can see each other in the club.
You think we will get some first-years?
Want me to try it on you?
Can you give me your LINE ID?
Looking forward to working with you.
No one else knows, but Azumi-kun and I have started dating.
First Half: The Road So Far
I really do not want to.
Be laughed at, and become strong.
I do not really want to get laughed at, though.
Hey, have you seen my potato mascot around here?
This is bad, is not it?
I found it in the storage room.
I get so nervous without this.
I even messed up today, you know?
I really do not like being in front of people.
It is so embarrassing, but I really like running, so...
You do not need to be embarrassed.
I think... you are fine the way you are.
The literature club has a superstition.
Pick out a book at random,
and that book will give you the perfect life advice for your situation.
At the very least, I do not believe romance comes down to chance.
I believe it comes down to volition.
Is your track meet coming up?
I am going to the shrine on Sunday, so I will pray for you
He should just ask her out.
I doubt Akane would turn him down.
Hey, is there a guy that you like?
I am going to train like mad.
But the school trip's coming up.
Are you going to train in Kyoto?
So, um, how was the meet?
I set a new personal best.
I was wondering how you did.
I was on my way home, thinking you might be here...
Who was it that translated I love you as Is not the moon beautiful tonight?
Was it Dazai Osamu or Natsume Souseki?
Would you go out with me?
You told me Curly-kun's cool, so...
Let us pick out gifts for the club members.
We are choosing gifts for our club.
You know how guys eat a lot.
You have someone, do not you?
If you are curious about someone, that counts, too.
There is someone I am curious about.
You should go out with him.
Azumi-kun: What are you up to?
We are going to be the ones to get yelled at.
If you want, tomorrow at 12:00 in front of Doimaru Department Store
We do not want you here.
Come on, we are already here.
My parents are asking about souvenirs.
I am at Doimaru Department Store
I never even gave him an answer.
You told me to meet you here,
so I came, but you were not here.
It is raining, and you are not answering your phone.
I do not know, but we cannot even talk at all...
to talk with you more, Azumi-kun.
Things you should not do in a relationship
I am going to go to that cram school.
Did you find the place okay?
I mean, I think it is okay.
I think I have a crush on Azumi-kun
I think I have a crush on Azumi-kun
Yeah, the publisher called me and said they wanted to meet with me.
I still do not know what they want to say.
You might be winning that award.
Oh, but it is this Sunday.
Sorry I cannot come cheer for you.
Let us both do our best.
You said you wanted to talk.
About that LINE message the other day...
We are searching for young writers right now.
You are in middle school, are not you?
Well, to be honest, I do not think you are cut out for serious literature.
Why do not you try light novel-type stuff instead?
I have a feeling you could do it, Azumi-san.
You were not focused at all, were you?
I was sure you could make it to prefecturals.
Your time was actually worse than last year.
Sorry I did not tell you we were dating.
And I am sorry I fell for him.
I do not know what to do.
